message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, but we're starting the negotiation at $110. Let me know if this works for you!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I think $100 would be a fair price for the product considering its value to me.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. To continue our negotiation, I propose a price of $105 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $98 for the product.

Thank you for your proposal, Bob. I understand your perspective on the product's value. To keep the negotiation moving forward, I suggest a price of $102 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $99 for the product.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I am glad we are getting closer to an agreement. Based on the discussions, I would like to offer the product at $101. Let me know if this price works for you.
